subject: Officiating (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Runners may not deviate from their path to score in order to initiate contact, but catchers who block their progress or stand in their way to field a throw are still open to a hit.
snippet: Runners may not deviate from their path to score in order to initiate contact, but catchers who block their progress or stand in their way to field a throw are still open to a hit.
